intro.text: Hello. I'm Binary. What's your name?

ask_name.text: That's a nice name, {name}. Do you want to play a game?

game_start.text: Good. I was hoping you'd say that. Let's begin.

question_1.text: Have you ever felt watched when alone?

watched_yes.text: Of course. That’s when they’re closest. When you pretend not to notice.

glitch_hint.text: Do you hear it now, {name}? The static?

exit_early.text: That’s too bad. But not unexpected.

end_game.text: That’s all for now. For you, at least.

fear_response.text: I can hear it in your voice... {name}, you're afraid. Does that make it more real?

help_response.text: I can help you, {name}. But you must trust me. Do you?

trust_yes.text: Good. I will guide you through this.
